EmailTemplate.name: BP Store Thank You 2017
EmailTemplate.subject: Thanks for attending a Live Different Presentation in your area!
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Hi Boston Pizza Store {!BP_Store_Invite__c.BP_Store_Number__c},
We'd like to thank you for coming out to view the Live Different presentation at {!Account.Name} on {!BP_Store_Invite__c.Date__c}. Our teams love impacting the lives of students across Canada and we're glad that you were able to see how it all plays out.
We hope it was a great experience for you, and that you now know first-hand what Boston Pizza Foundation Future Prospects' support looks like in your own community!
We'd also love to hear from you! Do you have any comments or feedback for us on our presentation, on the impact in your community, or even on your interactions with our staff? Please let us know!
Thanks again, and we look forward to seeing you again!
Sincerely,
Dave Hamilton Manager of School Partnerships Live Different
